title: New: Strange Babes – Holiday
content:
Head over heels in love with this ‘debut’ track from LA via NZ outfit Strange Babes.

As far as back stories go, Strange Babes rival anyones, with the two members, Sam McCarthy and Jaden Parkes having previously been bandmates with now now Grammy award winning Joel Little (Lorde – Royals). Holiday is two and a half minutes of perfectly formed beach-pop, part Craft Spells, part Wild Nothing, 100% bliss. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
